flawed_nl_solution:
Monty needs to feed 36 family members and each chicken/meal combo feeds 6 people so he needs 36/6 = <<36/6=6>>6 combos
Each chicken/meal combo costs $12 and he needs 6 so it will cost him 12*6 = $<<12*6=27>>27 to feed everyone
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72, not 27. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
